activities: Integrate is a pass through technology through which Customers are able to request self-reported data on individuals from third-party media providers.  At time, such data includes personal information provided by the individual.  Integrate does not request personal information from any end users.  Rather, it is a conduit through which Integrate’s customers can obtain this information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The data included in our self-certification includes Client Lead data (consumer PII) that is manually handled by our campaign management team.
privacyprograms: Integrate uses ISO 27001 as its framework for overall data protection and privacy.
